item.description: A little uncomfortable with this topic? You are not alone! Come learn age-appropriate ways to talk with your kids about their bodies and sexuality, explore some of your own beliefs and assumptions, and become more confident in your role as teacher and guide. We'll share some information about "normal" childhood sexual development that may surprise you, and also touch briefly on sexual behaviors that can be cause for concern. Bring your questions, bring a friend, and leave better-prepared to navigate this often uncomfortable -- yet very important -- terrain.
item.name: Discussion: Kids and Sexuality
